titles.title: A resolution to concur in the Senate amendment to H.R. 5043, with an amendment.

action.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 347 - 7 (Record Vote No: 459).

bill.summary: 10/21/1988--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 5043 (post-Federal employment restrictions), with the Senate amendment thereto, and concurring in the Senate amendment with an amendment.
